content.thinking: Looking at this document, I need to follow the classification workflow: 1. TEXT EXTRACTION: I can see significant text content from what appears to be an official document in Spanish. 2. PRIORITY CHECKS: This is not BLANK (has substantial content) and not LINK_ONLY (no main focus on URLs/hyperlinks). 3. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS: - What is the main purpose of this document? - Looking at the text, I see key indicators: - "CAMARA DE COMERCIO DE BOGOTA" (Chamber of Commerce of Bogota) - "CERTIFICADO DE EXISTENCIA Y REPRESENTACION LEGAL O INSCRIPCION DE DOCUMENTOS" (Certificate of Existence and Legal Representation or Registration of Documents) - This appears to be certifying the legal existence and representation of a company called "GEOESTUDIOS LTDA" - It includes company registration details, NIT number, address, commercial activities, etc. 4. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION: - The document is issued by "CAMARA DE COMERCIO DE BOGOTA" (Chamber of Commerce of Bogota) - This is a commercial registry authority, not a tax authority or private company 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION: Based on the analysis: - This is NOT CECRL (not a personal identification document) - This IS CERL (Certificate of Existence and Legal Representation issued by Chamber of Commerce) - This is NOT ACC (not showing shareholding composition - it's about company existence/registration) - This is NOT RUT (not a tax document from DIAN) - This is NOT RUB (not a final beneficiary registration from DIAN) The document clearly fits CERL category as it's: - Issued by "Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá" - Is titled "CERTIFICADO DE EXISTENCIA Y REPRESENTACION LEGAL" - Contains company registration information, matrícula, constitution details, addresses, etc. - Confirms the legal standing and representation details of GEOESTUDIOS LTDA I'll proceed with extracting the text and preparing it for JSON formatting, ensuring all details are accurately captured and properly escaped.
